content: the crochet pumpkin gnome is the perfect option for both halloween and fall decor and will look fantastic sitting on your mantel or shelf surrounded by your festive holiday trinkets simply switch up the yarn colors to your liking to fit your favorite holiday season the pattern also includes two different styles of shoes to customize your pumpkin gnome even more the pumpkin gome is excellent for gifts home or office decor pumpkin lovers imaginative play and more pattern information + your pdf purchase includes written instructions and helpful photographs to aid in construction + the pattern is written in english using us crochet terminology + the pattern is formatted to have one featured image at the beginning of the pattern for reference with all other full-sized images at the end for easy optional printing skills needed + the skill level needed is intermediate but ambitious beginners are always encouraged to try + the techniques you will need to know include chain single_crochet standing single_crochet slip_stitch single_crochet increase and decrease invisible decrease working in the back bar of the chain treble_crochet working in the front and back loop only bobble stitch picot the invisible finish and the adjustable magic ring + some hand stitching is also used in this project materials needed more specifics noted within the pattern + yarn in your choice of colors about 275 yds/251 m of worsted/aran + a size e/4 3 5 mm crochet hook + stitch markers + tapestry needle + stuffing + pins + scissors + chopstick to help stuff + button approx 1/2 inch /12 mm - optional + sewing thread and needle for buttons + doll needle at minimum 3 25 inches/8 3 cm in length finished measurements + using hook size e/4 3 5 mm and worsted yarn the pumpkin gnome measures approximately 11 inches 28 cm from the bottom of the foot to the top of the hat in a bent position and approximately 16 inches 40 cm with the hat standing straight up + the miniature pumpkin gnome in the images was made using the same pattern a 1 50 mm hook and size 10 crochet thread it measures approximately 7 5 inches 19 cm tall with the tip of the hat standing straight up thank you thank you for supporting my small business it means the world wishing you a blessed day as you spread kindness and creativity happy crocheting find more this pattern along with many other designs can be found here on ravelry and the blog at www jenhayescreations com copyright this pattern and its photos are copyright of jennifer hayes jen hayes creations and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not copy sell republish distribute or translate this pattern and its images in part or whole you are welcome to sell any finished items produced from this pattern please credit jen hayes creations as the designer and include a link to the pattern listing if selling the finished piece online thank you
